#include<cstdio>
#include<map>
using namespace std;

int b[23]={1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,16384,32768,65536,131072,262144,524288,1048576,2097152,4194304};

int next_int()
{
 int n = 0;
char c = getchar_unlocked();
 while (!('0' <= c && c <= '9'))
 {
 c = getchar_unlocked();
  }
  while ('0' <= c && c <= '9')
 {
  n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + c - '0';
  c = getchar_unlocked();
}
 return n;
}


int main()
{
long long int t,n,temp,ans,sum=0;
t=next_int();
while(t--)
{
sum=0;
n=next_int();
if(n>23)
{
printf("8388607\n");
goto abc;
}
while(n)
{
temp=n*(n+1);
temp=temp/2;
ans=temp*b[n-1];
ans=ans%8388608;
sum=sum+ans;
n--;
}
sum=sum%8388608;
printf("%lld\n",sum);
abc:
sum=0;
}
return 0;
}
